displaytitle: Studies of various figures and heads
medium: Red chalk (two tones), possibly worked wet, on tan laid paper
markings: Inscribed in graphite on mount, center, verso: original drawing by Carlo Maratta
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower center, verso: Mich: Corneille d'apres o Rafael / Urbino / 1660
